text: The Groupement de Recherche et d’Etudes en Gestion à HEC Paris (GREGHEC) is a CNRS - HEC Paris research center. It is located in Jouy-en-Josas. GREGHEC is one of the biggest research center in economy and management in France.GREGHEC - Groupement de recherche et d’études en gestion à HEC == Activities == The center is part of both the CNRS and HEC Paris.HEC Paris It is located in Jouy- en-Josas. Around 60 students studying in the Doctorate degrees offer by the school every year.200619325J : GREGHEC Groupement de Recherche et d'Etudes en Gestion à HEC Unité de recherche (situation 2023) The center bring together 120 researchers. The GREGHEC laboratory bases its research around management and also include interdisciplinary studies. Research is focused in particular in economy and management.200619325J : GREGHEC Groupement de Recherche et d'Etudes en Gestion à HEC Unité de recherche (situation 2023) The center has programs for students as well as for faculty to promote the concept of economy. Several initiatives that the center has started has raised awareness for both economy and management in both the community of Jouy-en-Josas and throughout the country.RÉSUMÉ FINAL DE L’ÉVALUATION DE L’UNITÉ : Groupement de Recherche et d'Études en Gestion d'HEC (GREGHEC) ==References== ==Further reading== * GREGHEC Category:Technology companies of France Category:2006 establishments in Europe Category:Companies based in Paris Category:HEC Paris
title: Groupement de Recherche et d’Etudes en Gestion à HEC Paris
